Home Euler

Project Euler 2 in JavaScript

@timgallant

'use strict';

var fib = function(n) {
  return function(n,a,b) {
    return n>0 ? arguments.callee(n-1,b,a+b) : a;
  }(n,0,1);
};

var e2 = function(x) {
  return function(a,b) {
    var fibNum = fib(a);
    if(fibNum % 2 == 0) {
      return fibNum < x ? arguments.callee(a+1,fibNum+b) : b;
    }
    else {
      return arguments.callee(a+1,b);
    }
  }(2,0);
};
